title: What are some popular children's shows in The Netherlands? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the top three what my four your old son likes: Brandweerman Sam (Fireman Sam)Buurman & buurman.Mega Mindy.This is what my 1,5 year old son likes: Sesamstraat (Sesame Street, local Dutch version)Het Zandkasteel.
